name: T34
description: The T34 Heavy Tank was an American design for a heavy tank. It evolved from the T29 Heavy Tank and T30 Heavy Tank in 1945, sporting a 120 mm (4.72 in) modified 120 mm Gun M1 anti-aircraft gun. Extra armor plating was applied to the rear of the turret bustle as a counterweight for the heavier 120mm T53 main gun. The vehicle was deemed very well made, and large production orders were placed.
armaments: 120 mm T53 L/60 rifled gun (34 rounds)
armour:
**Hull front:** 102–203 mm (4.0–8.0 in)
**Maximum gun shield:** 279 mm (11.0 in) maximum
**Turret front:** 303 mm (11.9 in)
